title: GeoNET GPS Navigator v8.1.439.apk
description:
GeoNET GPS Navigator v8.1.439.apk

[img]http://i.imgur.com/Cl1FSMj.jpg[/img]

Ã¢Ëœâ€¦ OSM (OpenstreetMap) the project that creates and distributes free geographic data for the world. GeoNet maps based on OSM data have worldwide coverage and stable updates
Ã¢Ëœâ€¦ HERE is a paid maps collection from NOKIA
Ã¢Ëœâ€¦ CityGuide Maps with "traffic jams" and regular updates
Ã¢Ëœâ€¦ Maps of National map vendors

Maps have different pricing, usage conditions and updates. GeoNET user can select necessary maps by himself. All maps have star rating, short descriptions, trial period.

GeoNET is OFFLINE navigation system, which do not require permanent internet connection. This allow to use data in case of absence of communication coverage and helps you to save significantly internet connection as well.

Other GeoNET advantages are:
Ã¢Ëœâ€  Smooth operation and high speed route calculation
Hardware acceleration full support on most devices. High speed work with maps. Instant route calculation, even using traffic information.

Ã¢Ëœâ€  Daily maps updates
It is not necessary to wait next maps update while using actual maps. Changes in road conditions on maps (Closed roads, "No TrafficÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½, one-way traffic, turn restrictions, and much more ) are being sent to map daily and will be used during route calculation.

Ã¢Ëœâ€  Patented route calculation using traffic jam information
When calculating the route, GeoNET is using a patented algorithm, which takes calculation direction of movement (plug in the directions) and in case of jams data absence- use statistical information about traffic jams.

Ã¢Ëœâ€  Dymanic POI (Warning of road events)
All GeoNET users can be warn by voice and on a screen for different events on the roads along the route (police, danger area, speedcams, local traffic accidents, bad roads, border traffic jams).

Ã¢Ëœâ€  Speedcams and radars
GPS navigator GeoNET warns in advance for stationary and portable speedcam.

Ã¢Ëœâ€  Service "Friends" and "Comments"
Be aware of the movements of your friends, share with them messages, leave comments, plan trips together.

Ã¢Ëœâ€  Service Ã‚Â«SOSÃ‚Â»
Special opportunity to call for cartug , technical assistance and other emergency services straight from software.

CAUTION :
While driving, please strictly follow road regulations of the road and then prompts GPS navigator alerts
What's new in this version : (Updated : Apr 15, 2014)
Bug fixes
Required Android O/S : 1.6+
